title: Did one of Starbucks' employees add the word "large " to the command of a police officer?
subtitle: Starbucks in Glenpool, Oklahoma, became the centre of argument in late 2019.
author: Dan MacGuill
vclaim: The Starbucks Bar in Glenpole, Oklahoma, added the word "boar" to the sign of a police officer's request in November 2019.
